greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: Partial row sums of A181842
maple: for k from 1 to n do
mathematica: t[n_, k_] := LCM @@@ IntegerPartitions[n, {n - k + 1}] // Total; row[n_] := Table[t[n, k], {k, 1, n}] // Accumulate; Table[row[n], {n, 1, 12}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jul 26 2013 *)
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Dec 07 2010
ext: Terms from an erroneous copy and paste transfer corrected.
